Deputy PM Winston Peters issues plea for immediate release of Kiwi pilot Phillip Mehrtens held hostage for one year https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/deputy-pm-winston-peters-issues-plea-for-immediate-release-of-kiwi-pilot-phillip-mehrtens-held-hostage-for-one-年/X4KVY3UZMFDP3CMJRTUEAFRECY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/deputy-pm-winston-peters-issues-plea-for-immediate-release-of-kiwi-pilot-phillip-mehrtens-held-hostage-for-one-年/X4KVY3UZMFDP3CMJRTUEAFRECY/ Benjamin Plummer“His continued detention serves the interests of no one,” Peters said. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 05:17:11 +0000 New Zealand pilot Philip Mark Mehrtens with the West Papua Liberation Army February 2023. Mehrtens has been a hostage of the separatist group since February 2023.
Questions raised over Rawiri Waititi’s suggestion Māori need their own trade agreements https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/questions-raised-over-rawiri-waititis-suggestion-maori-need-their-own-trade-agreements/JJHUGA2EPJHB3HSTHRNMONWHAA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/questions-raised-over-rawiri-waititis-suggestion-maori-need-their-own-trade-agreements/JJHUGA2EPJHB3HSTHRNMONWHAA/ Jenée TibshraenyRecent trade agreements include chapters aimed at promoting Māori businesses.
